## Queue.drain() method

Drains the queue, i.e., removes all jobs that are waiting or delayed, but not active, completed or failed.

TODO: Convert to an atomic LUA script.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
drain(delayed?: boolean): Promise<[Error, any][]>;
```
